name: Scott Wiggerman
bio:
Scott Wiggerman is the author of the poetry collections Leaf and Beak: Sonnets (purple flag, 2015), Presence (Pecan Grove, 2011), and Vegetables and Other Relationships (Plain View, 2000). His poems have appeared in Decades Review, Frogpond, Naugatuck River Review, Red Earth Review, Borderlands: Texas Poetry Review, and the anthologies Pushing the Envelope: Epistolary Poems, The Southern Poetry Anthology VIII: Texas, The Great Gatsby Anthology, Local News: Poetry About Small Towns, and the Lambda award-winning This Assignment Is So Gay.
Wiggerman is an editor for Dos Gatos Press in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
